full_summary:
## Service for Weather Radar Indicator

**Title**
 Transportation Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD) has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for a service contract to provide maintenance services for a weather radar indicator (WRI), Part No. MI-585351-2, Serial No. 1399, manufactured by Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) Honeywell.

**Reference Information**

*   Solicitation number: T8493-23-0089 (1)
*   Publication date: May 22, 2024
*   Tender closing date: May 31, 2024, at 14:00:00
*   Amendment no: 1
*   Amendment date: May 31, 2024
*   Expected contract start date: June 3, 2024
*   Expected contract end date: August 2, 2024

**Service Requirement**

The contractor must provide maintenance services (repair, overhaul, and/or modifications) for the mentioned weather radar indicator, which includes a detailed report of the work performed.

**Technical Specifications**

*   The WRI to be maintained is a OEM-Honeywell, Part No. MI-585351-2, Serial No. 1399.
*   The unit exhibits a failure to display on the screen and emit an overheating electrical smell.

**Evaluation Criteria**

 Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contracting Authority**

 Transportation Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD) will administer the contract.

**Contact Information**

For more information, kindly contact:

*   Tanya Nadeau, Telephone number: (343) 596-4353
*   Email: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca

**Attachments and Requests for Proposal**

The RFP is available on the Canada Buys website.

The attachments in English and French can be found at URLs: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/38629/rfp-\(e\-t8493-23-0089\)%281-\(weather-radar-indicator\.pdf\) and 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/38629/%28f\-ddp\_t8493\-23\-0089 %(281\)-\[indicateur-radar-meteo.\%.

**UNSPSC Codes**
25202101, 25202500, 25202600
